input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Pro Delta Bib Black"
Reference Product Description:
The Delta Pro Bibshorts represents the pinnacle of versatility and durability in our PRO bibshorts models and is one of our most popular bibshorts. Featuring deltaâ€™s textural face fabric and a wide fitting range, it offers a perfect balance of comfort and performance. The Pro-Ventilated Elastic Brace Paneling ensures breathability, while our renowned shock absorption technology and patented Antimicrobial Hydrophilic Chamois make it the ultimate choice for long rides. Built for all-day wear, the Delta Pro Bibshorts is suitable for any climate and any condition.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='MAAP Team Bib Evo Shorts'
  - Name='MAAP Team Jayco Alula Evo GreenEDGE Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Bib Shorts Indigo/White / XXL'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Mesh Moisture Wicking Cycling Base Layer'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Pro Air Bib Short'
  - Name='Sportful Supergiara Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Signature Shorts Evo'
  - Name='Endura Men's Pro SL II Bib Tights'
  - Name='Quest Men's Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Mille GTS Spring Fall Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Sportful Gts Cycling Bib Short'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Expedition Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Bib Shorts Wine Tasting/White / XXL'
  - Name='Castelli Competizione Limited Edition Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Man Sportful Giara 2 bibshort'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's AmFIB Cycling Bib Tights'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Cargo Liner Breathable Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Canyon Cycling Shorts with Liner'
  - Name='Rapha Core Cycling Bib Short'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Bib Shorts Dark Navy/White / XSM'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Free Aero RC Pro Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='ASSOS Equipe Rs Spring Fall Bib Tights S9'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Attack Streamlined Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Women's Expedition Bib Short'
  - Name='Sportful Men's Ultra Bibshorts'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Team Bib Evo Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a bib short similar in function and construction to the reference product, likely designed for cycling with performance and comfort features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Team Jayco Alula Evo GreenEDGE Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a bib short intended for cycling performance and comfort, closely matching the reference bib shorts in type and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Core Bib Shorts Indigo/White / XXL
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling bib short that shares the core product type and intended use, similar in performance focus as the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Mesh Moisture Wicking Cycling Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a base layer, not a bib short; while related to cycling apparel, its function and silhouette differ significantly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Pro Air Bib Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling bib short product focused on airflow and performance, closely aligned with the reference bib shorts.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A bib short for cycling performance, matching the silhouette and intended use of the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are cycling shorts but not specified as bib shorts; slightly less similar due to possible lack of bib construction.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib tights are similar but typically longer and for colder conditions; related but not exactly the same product type.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard cycling bib shorts, very similar to the reference product in function and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GTS Spring Fall Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib shorts with season-specific design, very relevant and similar to the reference bib shorts.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling bib shorts closely matching in features and use to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling shorts but not clearly bib shorts; similar function but possibly different construction.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A direct match in product type (bib shorts), intended for cycling performance like the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance cycling bib shorts, well aligned with the reference product's category and features.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling bibshort closely matching the silhouette and intended use of the reference bib shorts.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end cycling bib shorts designed for performance, very relevant to the reference bib shorts.
